name: Fazla Gıda Anonim Şirketi
description: Developer of a waste management platform designed to help businesses recover value out of food surplus. The company's platform reduces waste-related costs with data-driven recommendations and maximizes tax benefits with donations, provides quality into shrinkage, and helps in transporting food, enabling businesses to connect with foodbanks helping them to deliver the unsold food to non-profit communities, and people in need while preventing wastage of food.
one_liner: Developer of a waste management platform designed to help businesses recover value out of food surplus. The company's platform reduces waste-related costs with data-driven recommendations and maximizes tax benefits with donations, provides quality into shrinkage, and helps in transporting food, enabling businesses to connect with foodbanks helping them to deliver the unsold food to non-profit communities, and people in need while preventing wastage of food.
